create-wallet.title: Add ZetaChain to your Wallet
create-wallet.description: How to add the ZetaChain network to your wallet.

connect-wallet.title: Connect a Wallet in ZetaHub
connect-wallet.description: How to connect your wallet and use it in ZetaHub.

pool.title: Pool ZETA
pool.description: Add tokens to liquidity pools on ZetaChain, earn fees, view pool details, and manage your positions.

stake.title: Delegate/Stake ZETA
stake.description: Explore ZetaChain validators and delegate ZETA.

enroll-zeta-xp.title: Enroll in Zeta XP
enroll-zeta-xp.description: Who to participate in the Zeta XP program. ZetaHub’s way to track your activity on the app.

earn-zeta-xp.title: Earn Zeta XP
earn-zeta-xp.description: Who to earn XP in the Zeta XP program. ZetaHub’s way to track your activity on the app.

send.title: Send Assets
send.description: The Send page allows you to move your assets in and out of the ZetaChain network.
